## Installation

<Npm pkg="@sjsf/daisyui5-theme" />

### Install daisyUI v5

<LinkButton href="https://v5.daisyui.com/docs/install/" variant='secondary' target="_blank" icon="external">
  Install daisyUI as a Tailwind plugin
</LinkButton>

## Additional widgets

- `toggle`
- `filter`
- `callyCalendar` (depends on the npm package `cally`)
- `pikadayCalendar` (depends on the npm package `pikaday`)
